law.history: Repealed 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 491, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 1; and ch. 308, sec. 24. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 2. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 1; and ch. 274, sec. 1. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 3. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 1; and ch. 190, sec. 1. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, secs. 20 and 29. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2251, 2260, 2276, 2279-1.
